message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. I believe this price reflects the value it brings to you, while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $95 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $85 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After considering your proposal, I would like to extend an offer of $90 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit. Please let me know if this works for you!
Alice,  $90 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. How about we split the difference at $87.50?  I'm really interested in the product, but need to stay within my budget.
